markdown:
**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 67 There are a few principles of ability construction that you’ll want to keep in mind. Some guidance for specific types of abilities will come later, but these apply to everything.
  • Respect the action economy.
  • Make sure abilities are level appropriate.
  • Avoid “invisible” abilities.
